name: Xevious (itch)
description:
A vertical shooter game in the style of Xevious, the iconic arcade game from Namco. Guide the Solvalou Ship through 4 levels of my own design and destroy the Xevious threat before they take over.

Controls:

Arrow Keys move the ship

Spacebar shoots your bullets

 - Grab this to replace your bullet with a massive laser

 - Grab this and press C on the keyboard to launch a devastating beam-wave to clear a screen-full of enemies - Grab this to increase your shot input for multiple angles

- Grab this to outfit your Solvalou with mini ships that launch homing bullets on any nearby enemies.

- Grab the special flag whenever you see it for a bonus 1,000 points.

Every 10,000 points you get gives you an extra life.
